title: ASOBO_material_sail glTF extension
description: Define a material with a sail translucency shader. The result is a material with an additionnal lighting on the backface and with a translucency effect. It is mandatory to enable the 'Double Sided' parameter to light the backface.

sailLightAbsorption.description: Controls the absorption of the surface. If the value is 0, the surface let the light go trough it. If the value is 1, the surface is opaque.
